content: I'm thinking of making a big batch of roasted vegetables this weekend, and I want to try out some new seasonings and spices. Do you have any suggestions for seasonings or spices that can add flavor without adding extra salt or sugar? By the way, I had a great experience with Foodora last Sunday when I ordered from Tandoori Nights, an Indian vegan place. The vegan butter chicken with basmati rice and naan bread was around $12 and tasted so authentic.
